name: Prison Escape (itch) (FloezeTv)
description:
Prison Escape is a small jump and run game created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, where you control two players that have to work together to escape the prison.

Controls:

  • Player 1 (red):
    • move: W A S D
    • transmit energy: E
    • break things: Q
  • Player 2 (blue):
    • move: I J K L
    • transmit energy: O
    • break things: U

Graphics and sounds by me using MaryTTS and Bfxr; Font is Xolonium (forgot to add in credits)
